name: Bouncy Balls (SupercraftD)
description:
Everyone loves bouncy Balls. However, you have to be aware of the dangers to your Balls. Avoid the spikes, collect the upgrades, and try to keep your Ball bouncing for as long as possible!

-- Controls (more available in the in-game help menu. Press the "?" Button) --

- Move your mouse left and right to control your Ball

- Press and hold to speed up your Ball

----

All art, sounds, and programming are made by me. Font is SeymourOne from google fonts.
